phrases: Titans come and not a single drop of blood?
It means nobody here was eaten.
That is got to be it!
It is unbelievable to think Titans ate everyone without leaving blood behind.
That is not all that is unbelievable.
If the entire village was really evacuated,
why would Titans obliterate these houses with nobody in them?
But what really boggles my mind is the stables.
If they tried to escape without horses, their chances of survival would be slim.
Our mission now is to locate and assess the breach in the wall!
I did not hear anything at all.
I do not know how, but...
Do you understand the situation we are in?!
Hundreds of thousands of lives depend on whether we complete this mission or not!
Your family might have escaped, but it is not over yet!
If you are a soldier, put the mission first!
7 hours after the Titan spotting Western Team
We are getting close to the wall now, so there is no people living in the area.
That did not take us very long.
All right, let us head to the south.
There should not be any villages south of here.
We need to find the location the wall was breached.
We will ride along the wall from the west until we find it.
But Christa and I do not have our battle gear.
There is probably Titans roaming everywhere to our south.
It is very possible that we will become Titan fodder.
Let the two of us withdraw from the front.
I will need somebody to relay back a report.
I know how you feel, but you signed up for this as a soldier.
I am fine with putting my life on the line.
After all, I am the one who chose to join the Scouts.
But... it is not the same for you.
The only reason you joined the Scouts was because-
You think I did it for you?!
Then why are you even here?
You kept trying to convince me to join the Military Police.
But then you gave that privilege to me!
There is no way I am good enough to make the top ten on skill alone.
I am sure if I asked anyone, they would say you deserved to be in it, not me.
I do not know how you did it, but...
Why would you go that far for me?
The only reason I am here... is for myself and nothing else.
9 hours after the Titan spotting Eastern defensive line
The target has come within range!
At this rate, they will never break our defense!
The Titans' strength is in their numbers.
If they attack as a group, this line will not stand a chance.
We have not even spotted a single Titan yet.
We have got to be getting close to the hole now.
And yet, does not it seem awful quiet around here?
Hopefully, we can sneak in and out without stirring up a storm.
11 hours after the Titan spotting Southern Team
At any second, they could leap out from the shadows.
The closer we get to the hole, the more inevitable it becomes.
Did you follow the wall here, too?
Where did you find the hole?
We did not find anything to the west.
Did not you find it your way?
There is no hole this way either.
Is it possible we missed it?
Not a hole big enough for Titans to use.
Should we go back and look again?
We will need to, but the horses and the rest of us are exhausted.
If only we had some moonlight...
Information Available for Public Disclosure Torches
Though seemingly primitive, torches do not extinguish when dropped, making them ideal for night operations.
Due to their usefulness and long burning time, materials to make torches are issued as standard equipment in the Scout Regiment.
It looks like a mess, but we can make it work for one night of rest.
Are your hobbies so boring that playing with rocks is somehow fun for you?
But this is no ordinary rock.
It is a hardened fragment of skin left behind by the Female Titan.
Annie reverted from a Titan, but it is still intact even though it broke off her body.
When I compared it to a piece of the wall,
its pattern and composition were practically identical.
In other words, the wall is a barricade of humongous Titans.
And if I am right, the surface is constructed with hardened Titan skin.
That is exactly what Armin was saying...
As it stands, we will be hard pressed to fill the hole in Wall Rose.
That is, unless we can find the perfect boulder to plug it.
But if Eren, in his transformed state,
could use the Titans' hardening ability to seal the hole in the wall...
It should be made of the same material.
And seeing how the hardened section will not evaporate, even after you revert from a Titan...
I think it is well worth the risk to try.
And assuming it really does work, reclaiming Wall Maria is feasible, too.
Up until now, we have had to transport a large quantity of materials and supplies.
That is why the need for outposts past the wall limited our progress.
But if we do not have to accommodate supply wagons...
What if we carried out the plan at night?
During the night, when Titans cannot move.
If the group was small enough, you could sneak all the way to Wall Maria.
The current situation is as bad as it gets, but...
I realize asking this hardly seems fair, but...
It does not matter what you think.
Our forces are struggling so desperately, there is nothing else they can do.
I will do whatever it takes to seal the wall!
If what my dad said was true, we will find the answers to everything there.
You will end up like a little lost kid.
What did you expect you would see?
This is what happens when the wall falls.
Where do you think you are going?
Take a good look at the faces of people who have lost everything.
The faces of everyone you and your people abandoned.
If your church's wish comes true, and Titans come flooding through the walls,
we will all be gobbled up in their stinking mouths and die in the most miserable way possible.
All of humanity, digested as one.
Once we leave Ehrmich, we will be in Titan territory.
Think you can ride a horse?
Yours is ready at the west lift.
Have you had a change of heart yet?
We do not have time for this!
Will you talk, or will not you?!
The other believers are the same as I, and that will never change.
We are so grateful for all the help you have been!
It is too great a decision for a single person to make.
-The Order of the Walls must always adhere to the sacred will we are bound to obey.
-The Order of the Walls must always adhere to the sacred will we are bound to obey.
-The Order of the Walls must always adhere to the sacred will we are bound to obey.
I can inform you of a name, who under their sacred will, we were instructed to monitor.
That person joined the Scout Regiment as of this year.
Um, this is for you, Section Commander.
You must find her at once.
She may know the truths which even we cannot perceive.
That is all the information I can share.
The rest I leave in your hands.
If she is in the 104th, then she is deep in the front lines right now.
Upon my arrival, I gave my report to the Commander!
Afterwards, I was entrusted to deliver this message to the Section Commander!
So, who is this girl in the 104th?
She is the smallest one of us.
She is got long golden hair.
She is always hanging around Ymir.
What is the meaning of this?
I could not see them in the darkness, but then the moon...
It is been so long since the sun set!
It is... headed for the wall!
We are going our own ways now.
The rest is up to you.
Erwin may have thrown together your squad, but everything's riding on you.
Work with Hange and combine your knowledge.
I do not know why you are so attached to Eren, but...
Do not you be coming in here!
Got To be fricking kidding me.
I would be drinking right now if it was not for you!
It is time to show off our ODM gear.
Do not succumb to rage and lose sight of the goal.
There is a tower nearby where we can assess the wall.
It is in an abandoned castle to the southwest.
We will ride to Utgard Castle.
While searching for the Titans' breach in the wall, the Scouts arrive at Utgard Castle.
Their rest is cut short by Titans who move even under the darkness of night.
As the Titans' invasion presses within the castle, Reiner recollects a scene of his past.
